long_description: The Mountainsmith Daylight waistpack is a light and durable option for done-in-a-day adventures or as a secondary pack for backcountry and travel use. This rugged lumbar pack hugs your body for stability and comfort, and easily converts to a shoulder bag with a single shoulder strap. Patented Delta Compression System connects to hipbelt and pulls weight into the lumbar area for a stable, evenly distributed load; hipbelt tucks away when not in use. Top-loading main compartment and exterior zippered pocket with key clip organize gear; nylon mesh side pouches accommodate water bottles. Zippered interior pocket converts to a removable "stash and dash" pocket for carrying small essentials when you leave the waistpack behind. Bungee cord helps stabilize the load and secure an extra layer or other gear; reflective highlights increase your visibility in low light. Light, 210-denier ripstop nylon, bar tack/Hypalon(TM) and YKK(R) zippers stand up to years of heavy outdoor use. The stuffable Daylight packs down small into its own pocket; it includes a padded, removable shoulder strap for easy toting and dual carry handles for use as a briefcase.
